about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Interests
about.description: Technology and software development engineer, with more than 3 years of experience in web development. I am a person dedicated to what I do, always attentive to details or possible improvements, I work well in a team or individually, I am always willing to learn new things.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: My studies
education.certificates_title3: JavaScript University 2021 - From 0 to Master in JavaScript

portafolio.title: Portfolio
portafolio.subtitle: My projects
portafolio.description1: Responsive movie website made with React, API: TMDB and Material UI. You can see the information of both movies and TV series.
portafolio.description2: Responsive fake brand website 'Natural Medicine' made with Wordpress and elementor. This landing page is made with the purpose of showing my skills with Wordpress.
portafolio.description3: Responsive Beauty Salon website made with pure HTML5, CSS and JS. This landing page is made with the purpose of promoting and knowing the services offered by the beauty salon.
portafolio.description4: Responsive Kirsten Bakery website made with pure HTML5, CSS and JS. This landing page is created with the purpose of landing your customers by showing them your company, what it sells, and how to contact it to order your products.
portafolio.description5: Responsive weather website made with HTML5. CSS, JS and API: OpenWeather. You can write any country or city and the page will consult its climate.
portafolio.description6: Responsive note management website made with ReactJs, Bootstrap and Vite. You can create, view, edit and delete any note of your choice, even supporting markdown handling on the note text.
